'''18w22c''' is the forty-second and final [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.13]], released on May 31, 2018<ref name=18w22c>{{snap|18w22a|May 31, 2018}}</ref>.

== Changes ==
* F3 debug overlay now shows the fluid the player is looking at, separately from blocks.
* {{key|Tab}}-completing coordinates now completes each part separately.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=18w22c|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|107840|You can place blocks behind the shulker box when it's closing
|122257|Item name above hotbar appears every time the durability of the item gets changed
|126084|Cape render when sprinting underwater.
|;dev
|122592|Coordinate tab-completion doesn't complete all 3 axes separately.
|124686|{{cmd|/teleport}}'s rotational arguments use sender's rotation rather than context's rotation.
|125102|Surface caves and lakes in snowy biomes generate without the snow
|125134|Server crashes while generating new chunks – <code>java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: We are asking a region for a chunk out of bound</code>
|128860|Water source block gets destroyed when water flows on top of it.
|129254|Game crashes when hovering over an item with unknown block tag(s) in the <code>CanDestroy</code> and <code>CanPlaceOn</code> NBT.
|130453|Snapshot 18w22a Fatal Error Chunk Loading on Server

== Trivia ==
* This is the last version to use the iconic panorama background from [[Beta 1.8]].
* This snapshot, being the last for 1.13, was released in the same week of the year as the last snapshot for [[Java Edition 1.16|1.16]], [[20w22a]].
